name: Survival Game (Sujel)
description:
• Hello my nickname is Sujel and I have been making video games for 5 years.
  • It's my first "REAL" video game, it doesn't have a goal yet but it won't be long...
  • I titled it "Suvival Game" (the name is temporary).
  • You can walk around, explore the map eat, drink and more with beautiful images and a low poly theme !
  1. To launch the game you must download the version that interests you (I advise you the most recent).
  2.  Once the download is complete, open the folder and double click on "project-              survie-2022.exe".
  3. The game opens and you no longer have to play it!
The orders :

To play it's very simple : 

z = walk

q = go left

d = go right

s = back

left shift + z = run

right button = switch to mode "inspection" to pick up objects

i = inventory

c = craft panel
